label: Does Fliqz World offer advanced filters for content?
answer: Yes. You can filter content by type (photos, videos, posts), creator category, popularity, and subscription tier.

label: How do I access advanced filters?
answer: On your dashboard or in the Discover section, click the "Filters" button to reveal all available filter options.

label: Can I save my filter settings?
answer: Yes. You can save your favorite filter combinations for quick access later.

label: Are advanced filters available in the mobile app?
answer: Yes. The latest version of our app includes all filtering options available on the web platform.

label: Can I customize the type of content I see?
answer: Yes. Use the content filters and categories on your dashboard to prioritize creators or topics you're interested in.

label: How do I hide content I'm not interested in?
answer: You can mute or unfollow creators anytime, and adjust your preferences in Account Settings > Content Preferences.

label: Will Fliqz World recommend content based on my activity?
answer: Yes. Our recommendation engine suggests new creators and content based on your subscriptions, interactions, and viewing history.

label: Can I change my content preferences later?
answer: Absolutely. Update your content preferences anytime from your account settings.

label: How do I become a creator?
answer: Sign up, verify your identity, and complete your creator profile to start sharing content.

label: How do I maximize my earnings?
answer: Post regularly, interact with fans, offer custom content or bundles, and promote your profile on social media.

label: How are payouts processed?
answer: We process payouts weekly via secure third-party providers. You can track earnings and set payout preferences in your dashboard.

label: Are there content restrictions?
answer: Yes. All content must comply with our Content Guidelines and local laws. Prohibited content includes hate speech, non-consensual material, and illegal content.

label: What file types can I upload?
answer: We support most common image, audio, and video formats including JPG, PNG, MP4, MOV, and MP3.

label: How do I promote my page?
answer: Use social media, offer exclusive launch discounts, and engage regularly with fans.

label: Can I set up different fan tiers?
answer: Yes — offer multiple tiers with varying perks and prices.

label: How do I handle disputes with fans?
answer: Contact our support team for mediation and resolution assistance.

label: Do I pay fees on my earnings?
answer: Yes — platform and processing fees apply. See Fees & Payouts.

label: How do I report stolen or reposted content?
answer: Use the Report function or email legal@myvualt.com.

label: How do I start earning on Fliqz World?
answer: Sign up as a creator, complete identity verification, set your pricing, and start posting content.

label: What kind of content can I post?
answer: Images, videos, audio, and text posts — as long as it complies with our Content Guidelines.

label: How are payouts handled?
answer: Payouts are processed weekly to your chosen payment method, subject to applicable fees.

label: What devices are supported by Fliqz World?
answer: Fliqz World works on most modern web browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge) on desktops, laptops, and mobile devices.

label: Is there a mobile app?
answer: Yes, we offer apps for both iOS and Android devices. You can download them from the App Store and Google Play Store.

label: Does Fliqz World work on tablets?
answer: Yes, our platform and mobile app are optimized for use on most tablets.

label: What browser works best with Fliqz World?
answer: We recommend the latest versions of Chrome, Safari, or Firefox for the best experience.

label: Are there any operating system requirements?
answer: We recommend using devices with updated operating systems (iOS 13+, Android 9+, Windows 10+, macOS Mojave+).

label: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Subscriptions and click "Cancel Subscription." Your access will continue until the end of the billing cycle.

label: How do I find and subscribe to creators?
answer: Use our search and discovery tools to browse creators by category, popularity, or hashtags. Click "Subscribe" on any profile to unlock their exclusive content.

label: Can I request custom content?
answer: Some creators accept custom requests through direct messaging or special request forms on their profiles.

label: How do I tip a creator?
answer: Click the "Tip" button on a creator's post or profile and choose the amount. All tips are final and non-refundable.

label: Is my personal information secure?
answer: Yes. We use advanced encryption and never share your personal data without your consent.

label: How do I find creators to follow?
answer: Use search, browse trending categories, or check recommendations on your dashboard.

label: Can I pause or restart my subscription?
answer: Currently, you can cancel and resubscribe anytime. Subscription pause features are in development.

label: How do I receive updates from creators?
answer: Turn on email or push notifications in Settings > Notifications.

label: What payment methods are supported?
answer: We accept major credit/debit cards and digital wallets, depending on your country.

label: How do I request custom content?
answer: Message the creator directly to discuss custom requests (if they accept them).

label: Can I request refunds?
answer: Subscriptions and tips are non-refundable except in cases of duplicate charges or technical errors. Contact support within 48 hours.

label: How do I receive content updates?
answer: Turn on email or push notifications in your account settings.

label: How do I find creators to follow?
answer: Use the search bar, browse featured categories, or explore recommendations on your dashboard.

label: How do I subscribe to a creator?
answer: Visit their profile and click "Subscribe." Choose the tier you want and follow the prompts to complete your payment.

label: Can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Yes. Go to Account Settings > Subscriptions and click "Cancel." You'll continue to have access until your current billing period ends.

label: How do I tip a creator?
answer: Click the "Tip" button on their profile or content post, choose an amount, and confirm payment.

label: Can I request custom content?
answer: Some creators accept custom requests. Use the message feature or check their profile description for details.

label: How do I report inappropriate content?
answer: Click the "Report" option on the post or user profile and follow the instructions.

label: Will my subscriptions show on my credit card statement?
answer: Charges appear discreetly, typically under a neutral billing descriptor for your privacy.

label: How do I update my email or password?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Profile to update your email, and use the Change Password option to update your password.

label: What happens if my subscription payment fails?
answer: We'll notify you and retry the charge. If the payment fails after multiple attempts, your subscription may be paused.

label: Can I interact with other fans?
answer: Currently, Fliqz World focuses on direct creator-fan interactions. Future updates may include community features for fans.

label: Is there a Fliqz World mobile app?
answer: Yes! Our mobile app is available for iOS and Android. Download it from the App Store or Google Play Store.

label: What can I do on the mobile app?
answer: The app allows you to browse and subscribe to creators, send tips, post and schedule content (for creators), manage subscriptions, and communicate via direct messages.

label: Are there app-exclusive features?
answer: We occasionally roll out new features to the app first, including push notifications, offline viewing for select content, and enhanced fan club community tools.

label: How do I report a bug or issue on the app?
answer: Go to Settings > Help & Support > Report a Problem, or email us at support@myvualt.com with details and screenshots if possible.

label: Does the app use a lot of data?
answer: Streaming high-quality videos uses more data. We recommend using Wi-Fi when possible if you have limited data plans.

label: Is the app free?
answer: Yes. Download and use it at no cost — but subscriptions and tips are paid.

label: Can I schedule posts from the app?
answer: Absolutely. Use the Post Scheduler feature in your Creator Tools.

label: Why can't I see certain content?
answer: Some content may be geo-restricted or require a specific subscription

label: How do I update the app?
answer: Visit your device's app store and tap "Update" on the Fliqz World app page.

label: How do I sign up for Fliqz World?
answer: Click "Sign Up" on our homepage. Enter your email, create a password, and follow the prompts to verify your email address.

label: Is signing up free?
answer: Yes. Creating a fan or creator account is free. You only pay when you choose to subscribe, tip, or purchase content.

label: How do I verify my account?
answer: After signing up, check your email inbox for a verification link. Click the link to activate your account.

label: What information is needed to create a creator account?
answer: You'll need to provide basic profile information, upload a profile image, and complete identity verification to ensure platform security.

label: Can I switch from a fan account to a creator account later?
answer: Yes. Visit Account Settings > Become a Creator to upgrade your account and start earning.

label: How do I turn on or off email notifications?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Notifications and toggle the switches for the types of emails you wish to receive.

label: How do I enable push notifications on mobile?
answer: In the Fliqz World app, go to Settings > Notifications and allow push notifications. Also ensure your device settings allow notifications from the app.

label: Can I choose which notifications I get?
answer: Yes. You can choose to receive updates about new posts, messages, billing reminders, or promotional offers individually.

label: Why am I not receiving notifications?
answer: Check your spam or junk folder for emails, ensure push notifications are enabled in your device settings, and confirm your email address is verified in your account.

label: What payment methods are accepted?
answer: We accept major credit/debit cards and select digital wallets depending on your country.

label: Can I get a refund?
answer: Subscriptions and tips are non-refundable except in cases of technical error or duplicate charges. Contact support@myvualt.com within 48 hours for help.

label: Why did my payment fail?
answer: Check your card details, available balance, or contact your bank. You can also try another payment method.

label: How often are creator payouts processed?
answer: Weekly, once your earnings reach the minimum threshold.

label: Is my data safe?
answer: Yes. We use encryption, secure payment processing, and comply with GDPR/CCPA.

label: What payment methods can I use?
answer: We accept major credit and debit cards, and in some regions, select digital wallets.

label: When do creators get paid?
answer: Payouts are processed weekly once your account balance reaches the minimum payout threshold.

label: Are there fees on transactions?
answer: Yes. Platform and payment processing fees apply. You can view detailed fee structures in your Creator Dashboard.

label: Why was my payment declined?
answer: Check that your card details are correct, funds are available, and your bank isn't blocking the charge. You can also try another payment method.

label: Can I get a refund on a subscription or tip?
answer: Generally, all sales are final. Refunds are only issued in cases of duplicate charges or technical errors.

label: How do I update my payment information?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Billing and update your payment method.

label: Where can I find the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy?
answer: Links are available in the site footer and here: Terms | Privacy.

label: How do I delete my account?
answer: Contact us at support@myvualt.com or use the "Delete Account" option in your settings.

label: Can other users see my activity on Fliqz World?
answer: No. Your subscriptions, tips, and purchases are private and not visible to other fans or creators.

label: How do I control what information is visible on my profile?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Privacy to adjust which details (like profile picture or bio) are visible to creators.

label: Can I use Fliqz World anonymously?
answer: While your email is required for account creation, you can choose a display name and profile image that does not reveal your real identity.

label: How do I request deletion of my data?
answer: Contact support@myvualt.com or use the Delete Account feature in Settings. We will process your request in compliance with applicable data privacy laws.

label: Are subscriptions refundable?
answer: Generally, subscriptions are non-refundable as you gain immediate access to premium content upon purchase.

label: Can I get a refund for a tip I sent?
answer: Tips are non-refundable, as they are considered direct support to creators.

label: What if I was charged twice by mistake?
answer: In cases of duplicate charges or technical errors, contact support@myvualt.com within 48 hours for assistance.

label: What happens if a creator deletes their account before my subscription ends?
answer: You will lose access to their content. Depending on circumstances, partial refunds may be issued on a case-by-case basis.

label: How long does it take to process a refund request?
answer: Approved refunds typically take 5-10 business days to appear on your statement.

label: How do I report abusive content or users?
answer: Click the "Report" option on any post or user profile. Our moderation team will investigate promptly.

label: How do you protect my data?
answer: We comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other data privacy laws. You can request account deletion or data export anytime.

label: How does Fliqz World protect my personal data?
answer: We use advanced encryption and secure servers to protect your data. We comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other data privacy laws.

label: Can I block another user?
answer: Yes. Go to the user's profile, click the menu icon, and select "Block User."

label: What should I do if I receive abusive messages?
answer: Use the "Report" feature on messages or profiles. Our moderation team reviews reports and takes appropriate action.

label: Is my payment information safe?
answer: Yes. Payments are processed through secure third-party providers. We never store your full payment details on our servers.

label: How do you handle harassment or hate speech?
answer: We have strict policies against harassment, hate speech, and abusive content. Violations can lead to warnings, suspensions, or permanent bans.

label: What happens if my account is compromised?
answer: Reset your password immediately and contact our support team. We'll help you secure your account.

label: I can't upload a video — what should I do?
answer: Check your file type, size limits, and internet connection. If the issue persists, contact support with details.

label: I'm not receiving emails from Fliqz World.
answer: Check your spam/junk folder and ensure you've added our email to your safe sender list.

label: Videos aren't playing properly.
answer: Try clearing cache, updating the app/browser, or switching to Wi-Fi.

label: Having issues with uploads?
answer: Check file format, internet connection, and size limits. Contact support if needed.

label: I'm having trouble uploading a video. What should I do?
answer: Ensure your file is in a supported format (MP4, MOV) and under the size limit. Check your internet connection. If the problem continues, contact support with the error message.

label: Why isn't my payment going through?
answer: Verify your card details, check for sufficient funds, or try a different card. Contact your bank to ensure they aren't blocking the transaction.

label: I'm not getting email notifications.
answer: Check your spam/junk folder. Add notifications@myvualt.com to your safe sender list. Also, verify notification preferences in your account settings.

label: The app or website isn't loading properly.
answer: Try clearing your browser/app cache, update to the latest version, or switch to a different browser/device.

label: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
answer: Click "Forgot Password" on the sign-in page and follow the instructions in the email sent to you.

label: Why is my content stuck in processing?
answer: High traffic or large file sizes can cause delays. If processing takes more than 30 minutes, contact support.

label: How do I report a bug?
answer: Email support@myvualt.com with details, including device type, operating system, screenshots, and steps to reproduce the issue.

label: Notification Settings FAQ
answer: This page contains FAQ about notification settings with the following questions and answers: 1. How do I turn on or off email notifications? - Go to Account Settings > Notifications and toggle the switches for the types of emails you wish to receive. 2. How do I enable push notifications on mobile? - In the Fliqz World app, go to Settings > Notifications and allow push notifications. Also ensure your device settings allow notifications from the app. 3. Can I choose which notifications I get? - Yes. You can choose to receive updates about new posts, messages, billing reminders, or promotional offers individually. 4. Why am I not receiving notifications? - Check your spam or junk folder for emails, ensure push notifications are enabled in your device settings, and confirm your email address is verified in your account.

label: Refund Policies FAQ
answer: This page contains FAQ about refund policies with the following questions and answers: 1. Are subscriptions refundable? - Generally, subscriptions are non-refundable as you gain immediate access to premium content upon purchase. 2. Can I get a refund for a tip I sent? - Tips are non-refundable, as they are considered direct support to creators. 3. What if I was charged twice by mistake? - In cases of duplicate charges or technical errors, contact support@myvualt.com within 48 hours for assistance. 4. What happens if a creator deletes their account before my subscription ends? - You will lose access to their content. Depending on circumstances, partial refunds may be issued on a case-by-case basis. 5. How long does it take to process a refund request? - Approved refunds typically take 5-10 business days to appear on your statement.
